homepage.highlightsAreaDescription: Explore a wealth of creativity and cultural expression in this section. From exciting events to inspiring projects and captivating stories, immerse yourself in the vibrant cultural scene that our users have to offer.

registerpage.passwordTamanho: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter and one special character and be at least 7 characters long.
registerpage.termosPoliticaParte1: By clicking Done, I agree that I have read and accept the
registerpage.erroUserExiste: There is already an account with this email address

userProfile.removerEventoModal: Are you sure you want to remove this event?
userProfile.removerProjetoModal: Are you sure you want to remove this project?

configPage.termosdeUsoPoliticas: Terms of use and privacy policies
configPage.comoAddPub: How do I add a post?
configPage.comoAddPubDetails: Click on the icon with your profile picture that appears in the upper right corner of the site, then click on Profile and choose Add Event (to add event you must fill out the form that will appear with the information of the event)
configPage.comoMudarProfileInfo: How do I change my profile information?
configPage.comoMudarProfileInfoDetails: Click on the icon with your profile picture that appears in the upper right corner of the site, click on Profile and then click on edit profile that appears on the left side of the page
configPage.comoMudarProfilePhoto: How do I change my profile picture and cover?
configPage.comoMudarProfilePhotoDetails: Click on the icon with your profile picture that appears in the upper right corner of the site, click on Profile, and then click on the picture to select a new photo; the same process must be done to add a new cover photo.
configPage.comoReportarErrorDetails: Click on the icon with your profile picture that appears in the upper right corner of the site, click the Settings icon that appears on the left side of the page under the Edit Profile button, click on the Report Error item that appears in the menu on the left side of the page.
configPage.comoRemoverContaDetails: Click on the icon with your profile picture that appears in the upper right corner of the site, click on the Settings icon that appears on the left side of the page under the Edit Profile button, click on the Remove Account item that appears in the menu on the left side of the page.
configPage.removerContaDetails: Deleting the account will remove all content and data associated with the account and you will lose access to the account immediately.
configPage.inserirEmail: Enter your email address for your account
configPage.confirmarRemoverConta: Are you sure you want to remove your account?

loginPage.forgotPassEnterMail: Enter yout email and we´ll send you alink to reset your password.
loginPage.sucessoEnviarMail: An e-mail has been sent to you with instructions on how to reset your password.

cardDetailed.publisherInteractionNotAllowed: To interact with the promoter you must log in
cardDetailed.postInteractionNotAllowed: To interact with the post you must log in

common.croppedImage: Cropped Image. Adjust how the image should appear on the homepage cards.
common.recorteInfo: To enhance the visibility of your post, please click 'Crop Image' before saving and adjust accordingly.
common.noProjects: You don't have any projects to associate

common.imageSizeError: Error, image is too big to be added, the image must be less than 5mb!

postValidationsErrors.localObrigatorio: Location is required! Check that you have added the location and its coordinates.
postValidationsErrors.dataFimMaiorInicio: End date cannot be greater than start date!

postModal.title: Event location
postModal.explanation: Click to map your event and make it more accessible.

userModal.title: Add your location
userModal.explanation1: By adding your location, we'll map all the events and projects near you.
userModal.explanation2: Your location is confidential and only you have access to it.

udpateUserInfoModal.title: Add Your Name
udpateUserInfoModal.description: It seems your name is not configured. Please add your name so that you can be identified.
